amendment.description: An amendment to restore the entire $186 million rescinded by the bill for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program, and offsetting this by increasing by an equal amount (to $224 million) the amount rescinded by the bill from NASA science, aeronautics, and technology activities.

action.text: Mr. DeLay raised a point of order against the Shays amendment (A013). Mr. Delay stated that the Shays amendment sought to amend a paragraph previously amended and as such, could not be considered in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
